reason: Duplicate of q_1_0965/0966/0968 from batch_0052 - identical answer. Raw dump of 특별승진 제외사유 list. Question asks about '예외 사항' but answer lists exclusion criteria without distinguishing exceptions.
Bad question - '호에 따라 특별승진임용하는 경우' is a sentence fragment, not a proper question. Asks about '필요한 서류' (required documents) but answer lists 특별승진 제외사유 instead. Answer does not address the question.
Duplicate of q_1_0957/0958/0959/0961/0962 from batch_0052 - identical raw dump of 명예퇴직수당 지급대상자 신청 및 지급결정 source text.
Duplicate of q_1_0957 etc. Question asks for '구체적인 적용 사례' (specific application examples) but answer provides no examples - just the same raw dump of regulation text.
Duplicate of q_1_0957 etc. - same raw dump answer. While the legal citations in the answer are relevant to the question about legal basis, the answer is identical to all other entries on this topic.
Duplicate of q_1_0965/0966/0968/0969 - identical raw dump of 특별승진 제외사유 list with only minor formatting differences.
Bad question - asks about '행정 처리 담당자' (administrative handler) but the answer lists 특별승진 제외사유 without identifying any specific responsible party. Duplicate raw dump.
Bad question - raw source text ('다음 각 호의 사람을 우선 고려한다. - 상위직 공무원') is pasted into the question. Answer just repeats the priority list without adding any explanation.

Source mismatch - title says '특별승진 제외사유' but source.text and answer include items ⑨⑩ which are from the 명예퇴직수당 부적격 section, plus section 4) 명예퇴직수당 지급대상자 신청 which is a different section. Answer mixes unrelated sections.

Bad question - asks how 특별승진 제외사유 affects '교원의 경력' (teacher's career) but answer provides no analysis of career impact. Same source mismatch as q_1_0980 mixing ⑨⑩ and section 4) content under 특별승진 제외사유. Raw dump.
